title: feature request: prompt to save password
author: livilu
body_snippet:
**Feature request**: Prompt to save a new password if current is not working anymore

## Expected Behavior
sometimes password are changed due to security concerns or other reasons. It will make life easier if the app prompt to save a new password. This can be as an option or default behavior

## Current Behavior
Current behavior - SSH for example is that login is failing and server is asking a the password

iterations.description: Quality-of-life enhancement to prompt users to save updated passwords when authentication fails, reducing manual steps for credential rotation

notes:
AI triage (claude): Quality-of-life enhancement to prompt users to save updated passwords when authentication fails, reducing manual steps for credential rotation
Approach: Detect authentication failure events from SSH (PuTTY exit code) and RDP (OnLoginComplete/OnFatalError), then show a dialog offering to update the stored password in ConnectionInfo and persist to the connections file
